sub_title: Human Resources Specialist │ Diversity Equity Inclusion Expert  │  MBA - Innovation & Transformation
summary: An accomplished leader with extensive experience in human resources, financial management, administration and diversity & inclusion within renowned organizations such as the United Nations and the European Commission.  Equipped with an MBA specializing in innovation and transformation, as well as a degree in art history and formal education in coaching, training, and development, my educational background reflects my multidimensional approach to problem-solving and adaptability. Having lived and worked in various parts of the world, I can communicate in English, French, and Italian and possess a basic understanding of Spanish and Dutch. I am passionate about fostering innovation, driving transformative change, and creating high-performing teams. My commitment to excellence, coupled with my proficiency in multiple disciplines, positions me as a valuable asset in any organization aiming to thrive in today's ever-evolving business landscape.
